text: Nancy Walker (May 10, 1922 â€“ March 25, 1992) was an American actress and comedienne. She acted on stage, in movies and on television. She played Nancy in the movie Best Foot Forward. She also made many guest appearances on The Mary Tyler Moore Show. Walker was born in Philadelphia. She died from lung cancer at 69.
